title: Metro to Campus
description: Use the Sydney Metro instead of driving to Macquarie University.

title: Bike to Class
description: Cycle to campus and park near MUSE or 10 Wally's Walk.

title: Carpool with Classmates
description: Organize rides with friends to reduce single-passenger trips.

title: Walk Between Buildings
description: Skip the shuttle — walk to your next class for health and the planet.

title: Tap Opal Off-Peak
description: Travel off-peak using your Opal card to reduce congestion and emissions.

title: Veggie UBar Day
description: Choose the plant-based burger at UBar once this week.

title: Reusable Coffee Cup
description: Bring your own mug to Courtyard Café to cut waste and get discounts.

title: Meat-Free Monday
description: Go vegetarian every Monday for one month.

title: Zero Waste Meal Plan
description: Use all groceries before expiry this week.

title: Buy Local Challenge
description: Get fresh produce from local markets or vendors near campus.

title: Dorm Device Unplug
description: Unplug laptop, chargers, and lamps in your dorm when not in use.

title: Power-Saving Mode
description: Enable eco mode on your laptop and phone for a full week.

title: Charge at the Library
description: Use the solar-powered library to charge devices instead of your dorm.

title: Lights Out Habit
description: Turn off lights in shared dorm areas when leaving.

title: Natural Light Days
description: Use natural daylight for study instead of artificial lights.

title: Textbook Swap
description: Buy or trade secondhand textbooks from other students.

title: Reuse Market Visit
description: Pick up or donate items at the campus reuse market.

title: No-Buy Week
description: Avoid all non-essential purchases for one week.

title: Library Loan First
description: Borrow electronics or materials from the library before buying.

title: Bag It Better
description: Use a reusable bag at Macquarie Centre for every purchase this week.

title: Download Lectures
description: Watch lectures offline instead of streaming them repeatedly.

title: Tab Management Master
description: Keep fewer browser tabs open while studying.

title: Low-Bandwidth Zoom
description: Disable HD video and backgrounds in Zoom for all your meetings this week.

title: Dark Mode Days
description: Use dark mode on all your devices for the entire week.

title: Email Efficiency
description: Send fewer, consolidated emails to reduce cloud activity.
